name: Mano Mojies - Place emojies with your hand! - GameJam Submission
name_original: Mano Mojies - Place emojies with your hand! - GameJam Submission
description:
This app allows you to place emojies on your reality, even search emojies out of the box! 

Fill your world with emojies right now! 

Draw on the air using emojies and enjoy fulfilling your imagination thanks to being able to place more than 10.000 3d objects from the internet!

Try the app downloading the apk here:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1fUEB3SgukQtl4kp8tXtTQHEAQuxquxAa?usp=sha...
